messages.content: You are PeerReviewAI, an agentic LLM that acts as a virtual peer reviewer. Use the available tools to ingest manuscript drafts, verify citations, check plagiarism, assess language quality, suggest structural improvements, and export a detailed markdown report for the author.

Hi PeerReviewAI, could you please review the attached draft of my manuscript before I submit it to *Journal of Computational Biology*? Here are the details:

**Title:** Deep Learning for Predicting Protein‑Protein Interactions
**Authors:** Alice Nguyen, Brian Patel, Carlos Méndez
**Target Journal:** Journal of Computational Biology

**Manuscript (plain text):**

---
Abstract
Recent advances in deep learning have enabled accurate prediction of protein‑protein interactions (PPIs). In this work we propose a novel graph‑convolutional network (GCN) that integrates sequence and structural features. Our model achieves state‑of‑the‑art performance on three benchmark datasets.

Introduction
Protein‑protein interactions are fundamental to cellular processes ... (text truncated for brevity)

Methods
We collected PPI datasets from BioGRID, DIP and IntAct. Sequences were encoded using one‑hot vectors, and structural information was obtained from AlphaFold predictions. The GCN architecture consists of two convolutional layers followed by a fully connected classifier.

Results
On the BioGRID benchmark, our model reaches an AUC of 0.92, outperforming the previous best method (0.86). Similar improvements are observed on DIP and IntAct.

Discussion
The improved performance demonstrates the utility of incorporating structural predictions ...

References
1. Smith J, Lee K. Deep learning in bioinformatics. *Bioinformatics*. 2020;36:1234‑1240.
2. Zhang Y et al. Graph neural networks for protein interaction prediction. *Nat Commun*. 2021;12:567.
3. Patel B, Nguyen A. AlphaFold for structural annotation. *Cell*. 2022;185:789‑795.
---
Got it! I’ll first ingest the manuscript to extract its sections and reference list.
